name: Accessibility Highlighter
description: A browser extension to highlight accessibility problems on the page, giving a visual indication of what the problems are
author: AFixt

action.default_title: Accessibility Highlighter - Click to toggle accessibility checking

content_security_policy.extension_pages: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data:; font-src 'self'; connect-src 'none'; object-src 'none'; media-src 'none'; frame-src 'none'; base-uri 'none'; form-action 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
